title: Strengthening Learning Design Competencies: Socio-Humanistic Integrated Instruction for Engineering Project Culture Formation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Implement the step-by-step process of real engineering projects (problem definition → design → evaluation) with 80%+ accuracy.
Identify and apply three or more humanities-based evaluation criteria (e.g., ethics, social impact, sustainability) for engineering solutions.
Generate two or more design improvements reflecting humanities-based feedback in team projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
